BodyName: Subcommittee on Landmarks, Public Siting and Maritime Uses

Items.Title: Application no. 20075015 SCK, a proposed site for a 630 seat primary/intermediate school facility generally located at the southeast corner of Macombs Road and West Tremont Avenue in Council District no. 16, Borough of the Bronx.  This matter is subject to Council review and action pursuant Section 1732 of the New York State Public Authorities Law.

Items.ActionText: This Land Use Application was Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
